modName: Gwelda Armor Pack - Dawnguard soldiers replacer - UNP
summary: Replacement for the dawnguard soldiers armours in the game with the Gwelda Armor Pack by nsp13 / Deserter X
descriptionHtml:
[font=Tahoma][size=2][center][color=#ff7700][size=3]I'VE MADE A NEW AND EXTENDED VERSION OF THIS MOD THAT DOESN'T USES ANY .ESP, ONLY REPLACES THE MESHES

You can try it [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/60841/?]here[/url]

________________________________________________[/size]
[/color][/center]
This is a replacement for the Dawnguard soldier armor with the Gwelda armor pack.

Like I've done with the [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/56170/?]Ursine Armor - Stormcloak and Imperial soldiers replacer - UNP[/url], I used the nsp13 / Deserter X models to replace the original armors.

This is the first pack, I've planned to do the same with the Necromancers and the Vampires using the other models of the [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/56998/?]Gwelda Armor Pack[/url] but they perhaps will be delayed a bit because now I haven't much time to dedicate to them.

To avoid the same problems of my past replacement, I've opted to simplify the armor, using only the standard slots (except the body armor that uses also the panties) and as a result of this the armor is a bit more skimpy than the original (you always can wear the cuisses or armlets from the main pack)

I credit all the authors that made possible the awesome work of nsp13 / Deserter X:

[i]Armor meshes [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/47376/?]UNP Minidresses Collection by Tiwa44[/url]
Hair meshes [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/10168/?]ApachiiSkyHair by Apachii[/url]
Armlets, Bracers, Hood and Cloak meshes [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/18008/?]Ashara Princes of the Woods for UNP and male by SydneyB[/url]
Cuisse, socks, stockings, trousers mesh [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/24444/?]UNP Undies by Petrovich[/url]
Collar mesh [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/15529/?]R18Pn Set - Inner Wear Set for UNP and CBBEV3 by NPR[/url]
Boots mesh [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/43381/?]Bobs Boots for CBBE and UNP by Beazalbob69[/url][/i]

And how could it be otherwise, I credit nsp13 / Deserter X for his great mod that you need to have installed for this one to work.


[color=red]Known issue[/color]

I do not know how to apply HDT parameters to the boots. You need to apply them manually with the HDT menu.



If you liked it, perhaps you want to try my other replacer:

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/57568/?]Sexy Elven Armors[/url]
[/size][/font]
author: PeCool
